# Copilot Instructions

## Plan and Todo Files

When creating any new plan, todo list, task list, or project planning document:
- Always place the file in the `docs/todo/` folder
- Use descriptive filenames with dates when appropriate (e.g., `2026-02-06-feature-plan.md`)
- Follow Markdown format for all planning documents

## Code Style

- This is a Next.js project with TypeScript
- Use Tailwind CSS for styling
- Follow existing patterns in the codebase
- Place API routes in `app/api/` directory
- Place reusable components in `components/` directory
- Place utility functions in `lib/` directory
